options.name: Rune of Destruction
options.description: Multiple Wounds (D3).

options.name: Rune of Smashing
options.description: Attacks allocated towards a model with Resilience 5 or more have both their Strength and their Armour Penetration set to 10.

options.name: Rune of Penetration
options.description: +3 AP.

options.name: Rune of Might
options.description: +1 Str, +1 AP.

options.name: Rune of Precision
options.description: +1 to hit.

options.name: Rune of Craftsmanship
options.description:
The weapon follows the rules for Great Weapon instead of its original Weapon Rules.
This does not prevent it from being engraved with additional Runic Weapon Enchantments.

options.name: Rune of Quickening
options.description: +3 Agi.

options.name: Rune of Anger
options.description: +1 Att.

options.name: Rune of Lightning
options.description:
Max. 2 per model.
Grind Attack (D3, Str 4, AP 1, Lightning Attacks,Magical Attacks, Unmodifiable).
A model with two instances of this Rune increases the number of hits to 2D3.
Note that these hits are not affected by the effects of other Runic Weapon Enchantments.

options.name: Rune of Returning
options.description: Can be used as a Shooting Weapon with the following profile: Range 8", Shots 1, Str , AP , Quick to Fire,Accurate, The effects of other Runic Weapon Enchantments apply to Shooting Attacks made with this weapon (even if their effects were normally restricted to Melee Attacks, including Special Attacks).

options.name: Rune of Fire
options.description:
When Choosing Equipment and Abilities, the wielder may gain Flaming Attacks.
Duration: Round of Combat.

options.name: Rune of Resistance
options.description: Resistance.

options.name: Rune of Steel
options.description: Must reroll failed Armour Save rolls.

options.name: Rune of Retribution
options.description: When a model successfully makes an Aegis Save from Shield Wall, it immediately inflicts 1 hit towards the Health Pool of the model that caused the wound, using the same Strength and Armour Penetration as the saved attack with Automatic Hits. This hit is resolved before any casualties are removed and does not benefit from Weapon Rules or Runic Weapon Enchantments.

options.name: Rune of Iron
options.description:
Max. 2 per model.
+1 Arm.

options.name: Rune of the Forge
options.description: Aegis (3+, against Flaming Attacks).

options.name: Rune of Denial
options.description:
One use only.
The player may choose to use this Rune instead of performing a Dispelling Roll. The spell is automatically dispelled.

options.name: Rune of Devouring
options.description:
Runic Smiths only
One use only. The player may choose to use this Rune instead of performing a Dispelling Roll.
The spell is cast as normal, but the Caster may not cast it again for the rest of the game.

options.name: Rune of Harnessing
options.description:
Runic Smiths only
In each of your opponent’s Magic Phases, immediately after Excess Magic, they must discard 1 Magic Dice.

options.name: Rune of Courage
options.description: One use only. May be activated when Choosing Equipment and Abilities. The bearer gains Stubborn. Duration: Round of Combat.

options.name: Rune of Dragon's Breath
options.description: Breath Attack (Str 4, AP 1, Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks).

options.name: Rune of Grounding
options.description:
Runic Smiths only
One use only. May be activated when Choosing Equipment and Abilities.
All spells with Duration: One Turn that affect any of the following units come to an end:
  • The bearer’s unit.
  • Enemy units in contact with the bearer’s unit.

options.name: Rune of Readiness
options.description:
One use only. May be activated at the end of the Charge Phase, immediately after all Charge Moves have been resolved.
If the bearer’s unit was successfully charged during this phase, it may perform a Combat Reform (following the normal rules for Combat Reforms).

options.name: Rune of Storms
options.description:
One use only. May be activated at the start of the opponent’s Player Turn.
Choose a single enemy unit within 24" of the bearer.
The Charge Speed and Mobility of all models with Fly in that unit are halved, rounding fractions up. Duration: End of Turn.

options.name: Rune of Shielding
options.description: Aegis (+1, max. 4+), which can only stack with itself and Shield Wall.

options.name: Rune of Channeling
options.description:
Channel(1).
This Rune can only be used if the model’s army total combined value for Channel is 3 or less (excluding Channel from this Rune).

options.name: Rune of Mining
options.description:
During Pre-game Selections, choose a Terrain Feature on the Battlefield.
As long as the bearer is on the Battlefield, all friendly models may treat this Terrain Feature as Open Terrain when making a Move Manoeuvre (Advance, March, Reform), but must still follow the Unit Spacing rule at the end of their move.

options.name: Rune of Kinship
options.description:
Cannot be taken by a model on War Throne
The bearer gains Ambush (Battlefield Edge), Scout, Vanguard.

options.name: Runic Standard of Grudges
options.description: Ancient Grudge.

options.name: Runic Standard of Swiftness
options.description: The bearer’s unit gains Vanguard.

options.name: Runic Standard of Dismay
options.description: Charge Range rolls against the bearer’s unit gain Minimised.

options.name: Runic Standard of Steadiness
options.description:
One use only. May be activated at the start of any Movement Phase.
The bearer’s unit loses Unwieldy. Duration: End of Turn.

options.name: Runic Standard of the Anvil
options.description: Whenever a friendly unit Charges an enemy unit already Engaged in Combat with the bearer’s unit and fails its Charge Range roll, it must reroll that roll.

options.name: Runic Standard of Wisdom
options.description:
Select a single Battle Rune and write it on your Army List.
This Battle Rune can be cast by the bearer as a Bound Spell.
It can only target the bearer’s own unit.

options.name: Rune of Revocation
options.description:
Ignore all other spell effects on the target from spells with Duration: One Turn.
The target unit gains
Magic Resistance (2), which is also applied to friendly spells.

No model can be affected by more than one instance of the same Battle Rune Bound Spell simultaneously.

options.name: Rune of Reckoning
options.description:
Friendly models in the target unit gain Hatred.
Melee Attacks by friendly models towards the target unit gain Hatred.

No model can be affected by more than one instance of the same Battle Rune simultaneously.

options.name: Rune of Oaths
options.description:
Friendly models in the target unit gain Zeal.
Melee Attacks by friendly models towards the target unit gain Zeal.

No model can be affected by more than one instance of the same Battle Rune simultaneously.

options.name: Rune of Resolve
options.description:
The target gains Swiftstride and, until the end of the Player Turn, it also gains Light Troops.
In addition, the target may immediately perform a Magical Move (4 Mob).

No model can be affected by more than one instance of the same Battle Rune simultaneously.

options.name: Rune of Gleaming
options.description:
The target gains Distracting (1),Hard Target (1).

No model can be affected by more than one instance of the same Battle Rune simultaneously.

options.name: Rune of Resilience
options.description:
To-wound rolls against the target suffer a -1 modifier.

No model can be affected by more than one instance of the same Battle Rune simultaneously.

options.name: Runic Standard of the Hold
options.description:
All models in the bearer’s unit gain Resolute.
If the unit contains a model that already has Resolute from another source, the unit is considered to have two additional Proper Ranks instead of one.

options.name: Duna Bregold, Master of the Guild of Lorekeepers
Dinaz Betegoz, Master of the Guild of Lorekeepers
